title: After pressing "Launch" nothing happens

replies.body:
This usually happens if you're unable to properly connect to our login servers. Incompatible network settings are the most common culprit for this, so working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should help you resolve this for good.

Let me know if this worked.
